9 namespace smacc_planner_switcher
10 {
11 void PlannerSwitcher::init(ros::NodeHandle& nh)
12 {
13  dynrecofSub_ = nh.subscribe<dynamic_reconfigure::Config>("/move_base/parameter_updates" , 1, boost::bind(&PlannerSwitcher::dynreconfCallback, this, _1));
14 }
15 
16 void PlannerSwitcher::setBackwardPlanner()
17 {
18  desired_global_planner_ = "backward_global_planner/BackwardGlobalPlanner";
19  desired_local_planner_ = "backward_local_planner/BackwardLocalPlanner";
20  updatePlanners();
21 }
22 
23 void PlannerSwitcher::setForwardPlanner()
24 {
25  desired_global_planner_ = "forward_global_planner/ForwardGlobalPlanner";
26  desired_local_planner_ = "forward_local_planner/ForwardLocalPlanner";
27  updatePlanners();
28 }
29 
30 void PlannerSwitcher::setDefaultPlanners()
31 {
32  desired_global_planner_ = "navfn/NavfnROS";
33  desired_local_planner_ = "base_local_planner/TrajectoryPlannerROS";
34  updatePlanners();
35 }
36 
37 void PlannerSwitcher::updatePlanners(bool subscribecallback)
38 {
39  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Setting global planner: " << desired_global_planner_);
40  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Setting local planner: " << desired_local_planner_);
41 
42  dynamic_reconfigure::ReconfigureRequest srv_req;
43  dynamic_reconfigure::ReconfigureResponse srv_resp;
44  dynamic_reconfigure::StrParameter local_planner, global_planner;
45  dynamic_reconfigure::Config conf;
46 
47  local_planner.name = "base_local_planner";
48  local_planner.value = desired_local_planner_;
49  conf.strs.push_back(local_planner);
50 
51  global_planner.name= "base_global_planner";
52  global_planner.value = desired_global_planner_;
53  conf.strs.push_back(global_planner);
54 
55  srv_req.config = conf;
56  ROS_INFO("seting values of the dynamic reconfigure server");
57  ros::service::call("/move_base/set_parameters", srv_req, srv_resp);
58  ros::spinOnce();
59  ros::Duration(0.5).sleep();
60  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Response: "<< srv_resp);
61 }
62 
63 void PlannerSwitcher::dynreconfCallback(const dynamic_reconfigure::Config::ConstPtr& configuration_update)
64 {
65  auto gp = std::find_if(configuration_update->strs.begin(),configuration_update->strs.begin() ,
66  [&](const dynamic_reconfigure::StrParameter& p)
67  {
68  return p.name == "base_global_planner" && p.value == desired_global_planner_;
69  });
70 
71  auto lp = std::find_if(configuration_update->strs.begin(),configuration_update->strs.begin() ,
72  [&](const dynamic_reconfigure::StrParameter& p)
73  {
74  return p.name == "base_local_planner" && p.value == desired_local_planner_;
75  });
76 
77  if(gp== configuration_update->strs.end() || lp == configuration_update->strs.end())
78  {
79  ROS_INFO("After planner update it is noticed an incorrect move_base planner configuration. Resending request.");
80  set_planners_mode_flag =false;
81  updatePlanners(false);
82  }
83  else
84  {
85  ROS_INFO("Planners correctly configured according to parameter update callback");
86  set_planners_mode_flag= true;
87  }
88 }
89 };
